attributes.action: Request for fast trains from Hounslow/Isleworth to Waterloo
attributes.additional_details:
To whomsoever concerned,

We the residents of Hounslow/Isleworth request that a fast train be introduced during the peak times from and to Waterloo.

The Current trains are slow and with the frequent delays to the service the time taken in the waiting at the train stations and the transit time to the offices are more than 1 hour from Hounslow / Isleworth.

With the closure of the London Bridge Station, there are many people who are affected and whose cost and time spent in travelling is increasing.  However this is not limited to those commuters alone.

This would ease the load on the Piccadilly line and many people who are using the tube services from Hounslow Central and Hounslow East station would also start using the Fast Trains from Hounslow when introduced.

We would request to change / introduce Fast trains from Hounslow similar to those currently operating from Feltham.
